name: The Forsaken (Sacrificial Media)
description:
Are you a fan of   the original   Resident Evil   series? Then this may be for you.  

 An unknown threat has caused the citizens of Sarin City to become violent, blood thirsty savages. A few of the remaining unaffected are now forced to uncover the truth of what's behind this sudden series of random acts of violence. Through the eyes of Osiris Farrow, you will fight for your survival as you   search thick and thin to discover clues to uncover the truth. But  which ending will you get?
